release.action: Make robust to failure to load HelpSet.
Adql Editor added. The previous datacenter editor is still there but unused; it will be cannibalized in the next release.
New workflow transcript viewer added - integrated with Lookout
Fixed bug in the xmlrpc plastic client that was trying to send non-xmlrpc compatible objects.
Improved registry browser, added script validation
updated to latest version of stil (2.3-1)
Improved votable parsing in astroscope
Improved parsing of registry entries, made more error-tolerant - more services displayed in astroscope.
Thread-pooling, leads to speedups, and better reporting - esp in astroscope
fixes, help added application launcher.
Merged in Plastic.
AstroScope - query all registered siap and cone services, vizualize and navigate results, save data locally or to myspace
Completed JES Workflow editor.
Improved Query and Application launcher for CEA / SIAP / CONE services. Handles repeating and optional parameters.
Registry Google - search, browse and select formatted registry entries.
NVO DataScope launcher - saves results from datascope into myspace
VO Lookout - launch, monitor, and control remote processes (CEA / SIAP / Cone queries and tasks, JES workflows). View results.
In-program help - some documentation there, more to come
ACR support for Siap and Cone services - low level interface, plus integration with remote process system.
Upload and unzip archives to myspace
hide left-hand button bar on startup - less daunting for beginners.
Basic ADQL query builder
added fallback registry endpoint to configuraiton
Moved more jars into extensions, updated versions. (Axis 1.3, new Astrogrid libraries)
Fixed myspace upload to work under java 1.5. Fixed documentation for getWriteContentURL()
Broken report a bug link in help.
Stopped VOSpace browser intialising with a disabled tab selected.
Improved icons and other cosmetic improvements
Based on 1.1-beta-3
myspace tree is cleared on logout
improved display of folders in myspace.
fixed bug in 'Myspace.getWriteContentURL()' and improved documentation
Added 'reset configuration' option to help menu
Added user information object to community
Added listener interface to acr shutdown - so clients have chance to veto, and are at least notified of this happening
Fixed parsing of application registry entries to make more quirk-tolerant
Added summary-returning search methods to registry interface. Removed wrapping elements from results.
Changed listener implementation to handle disappearance of client
Added final 'prompt-user' fall-through to finder.
Added keyword Search to registry interface
Added CDS interfaces
Updated JDIC lib to 0.9.1
Fixed broken links in webstart associations
Added 'listMetadata' method to myspace interface
grayed-out 'help' menu option until some is written
solved blank screen at startup problem
split acr interfaces into separate project
updated to latest version of registry delegate - now caches results, and provides xquery.
added system tests that exercise ag components through rmi and xmlrpc
cleaned up acr public interface
added java rmi interface to acr
assorted improvements of the workflow viewer
Added beta of workflow viewer
Improved workbench function descriptions
tidied up example python scripts
Added example script for connecting to ACR from perl
Updated list of external apps
Added real splash screen
Fixed endpoint configuration, logging configuration, and possible ipv6 problem.
Removed 'indirect' buttons from parameter editor for parameterized workflows - doesn't make sense to have it.
Improved resource chooser dialogue to make it easier to use.
Removed 'show in portal' from job monitor - never worked.
Replace file chooser dialogue by resource chooser dialogue throughout - means many things can be loaded / saved to myspace.
Relocate operation in myspace browser lists available stores.
Removed 'file' tab from resource chooser for indirect parameters
Fixed error on logout
Applications in monitor now persist between workbench sessions
Creating a new file in the filemanager selects that filemanager
Made display of workflows more tolerant of oddities in workflow
Based on 1.0.3-beta-2
Added 'system.apihelp' component - returns documentation for ACR methods
Fixed nulls in parameter editor
Altered query so only active applications are visible
Added map-style methods for building tool documents
Added link to JDIC (Desktop Integration) JNLP Extension.
Added System tray icon. Displays GUI when hidden. (Not on Macs).
Fixed duff ivorn on repeated application launch.
fixed typo.
Made application launcher remember window position.
Removed inactive registry entries from app and server lists.
Made parsing of application descriptions tolerant of missing data. Still need to fix castor problems with namespaces - until then some reg. entries will still cause errors.
Improved display of loooong error messages
Fixed 'cancel' button on parameterized workflows
Added rudimentary help set
Based on 1.0.2-alpha-2
Added changes report.
Bundled set of docs into jnlp site
Fixed Race condition on startup - reliable, but perceived startup is now slower.
Added cheezy splash screen to hide startup time. Better graphics needed.
Added JavaHelp browser - now need to write helpset.
Moved large jars into jnlp extensions - should improve download time for desktop updates
Added bounds checking for position-remembering windows Should mean that all windows are visible onscreen.
Added CEA Application Launcher GUI
